views.markdown:
• Adds support for Overcast podcasts and episodes. • Adds support for the Submarine Reddit client. • Adds support for Instagram location links. • Adds support for m.twitter.com links. • Fixes an issue causing the setting for Reddit thread links to be ignored. • Fixes an issue causing Instagram picture/video links to show a not found error. • Fixes an issue causing eBay item links without the item name to not be overridden. • Removes App.net support (RIP). • Adds a settings page (found under the Opener settings page) to enable or disable individual features of LinkOpener.
• Adds support for Dict.cc, iFile/Filza (file:// URLs), Instagram, Tumblr, Vine, and Yelp links, as well as eBay searches.
• Fixes an issue causing Reddit threads to not open.

• Fixes an issue that causes a crash when injecting a tweak into a 32-bit app (such as Cydia) on iPhone 6s.
• Fixes support for recent releases of Alien Blue.
- Fixes issues with the new Reddit-owned version of Alien Blue.
- Adds support for Reddit /r/subreddit links.
- Fixes an issue that caused certain Reddit links to not be detected. - Support for iOS 7 and Opener’s new API.
- Adds support for iOctocat (GitHub) and Alien Blue (Reddit threads).
- Added Twitterrific support

- Added twitter statuses.
- Added Netbot support Fixed bug in contacts.

Version 1.0.4
Added google maps Version 1.0.3
Added support for IMDB titles . (Credit goes to bensge for making this.) Added support for iOS 6

Bug fixes to ebay link detection
